p: It is unlikely that the injurious effects of obese white adipose tissue such as increasing glucose intolerance will arise from constricted transplanted adipose tissue in a systemic relevant extent, as the amount of the transplanted fat tissue is marginal compared to the total body fat mass. Though it is worth knowing that transplanted adipose tissue shows a comparable genetic profile than inflammatory obese white adipose tissue. Immunohistochemical staining for selected antibodies (FASN, Osteopontin and MS-2) confirmed the results from the genetic profiling ( Figure 10).
